name: UpdateIntercomContact
description:
Update an existing Intercom contact's details.

Use this tool to update information for a user or lead in Intercom. Call this tool when you need to modify existing contact details.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the contact to update in Intercom.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the Intercom API version to use, such as '1.0' or '2.9'.

parameters.name: contact_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the updated data for the contact. Include keys like 'name', 'email', etc.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
